trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000010_RYNE<tab>Restoring the elements to the Empty may allow life to flourish there once more...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000020_RYNE<tab>But that isn't enough to return the environment to the way it was. No, we need to gradually reintroduce life, beginning with plants.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000030_RYNE<tab>Not just any plants, though, but those that won't be a burden on a weakened land...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000040_RYNE<tab>Such as...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You've become quite the scholar.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I see you've taken an interest in gardening.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>How about coffee plants?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000050_RYNE<tab>Oh! What a welcome surprise!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000060_RYNE<tab>It seems you caught me rambling to myself. How embarrassing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000070_RYNE<tab>I've been studying botany, you see, hoping that the knowledge would help our work in the Empty.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000080_RYNE<tab>Coffee... If I recall correctly, it thrives in warm climates, with cooler nights to promote growth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000090_RYNE<tab>Yes. Yes, that might be suitable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000100_RYNE<tab>And with a good harvest, we could set some aside for coffee biscuits!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000110_RYNE<tab>Wait... It's you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000120_RYNE<tab>It seems you caught me rambling to myself. How embarrassing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000130_RYNE<tab>I've been studying botany, you see, hoping that the knowledge would help our work in the Empty.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000140_RYNE<tab>But never mind that for now. What brings you to the Crystarium? It was my understanding that the Final Days were behind us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000150_RYNE<tab>You wish to combat this otherworldly threat with the power of Light...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000160_RYNE<tab>Please let me help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000170_RYNE<tab>Though I've lost my connection to Hydaelyn, I can still manipulate Light to a degree.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000180_RYNE<tab>If there is a chance I could save others with that power, then I have to try.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000190_BEQLUGG<tab>'Tis done. Zero is now with us in the flesh.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000200_BEQLUGG<tab>The spirit vessel, I shall hold on to for operating the tower.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000210_BEQLUGG<tab>This will help me to make sense of the controls, will it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000220_BEQLUGG<tab>There's a levity in his words that wasn't there before. It heartens me to know he is well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000230_BEQLUGG<tab>I shall see to the preparations as per his instructions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>My thanks for your help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000250_BEQLUGG<tab>Think nothing of it. That said, 'tis customary that my kind receive fitting payment for services rendered...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000260_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not unlike we voidsent, then. In that case, you may devour some of my aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000270_BEQLUGG<tab>Are you mad? I'll do no such thing! The very suggestion is absurd!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000280_RYNE<tab>Now, now, let's calm down. We all have our preferences, and I'm sure no offense was intended.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000290_BEQLUGG<tab>I shall attend to the tower now. The rest, I leave to you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000300_RYNE<tab>Zero, was it? My name is Ryne. It's a pleasure to meet you.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This world isn't what I expected. While Light is indeed strong here, it's not pervasive or overwhelming. Everything looks much as it does in the Source.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000320_RYNE<tab>We have the Warrior of Darkness to thank for that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000330_RYNE<tab>If you're interested, I would be glad to show you around.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Just an ordinary sky. Ordinary...and beautiful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To think that, after so much loss, they could reclaim this...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So this is the Flood of Light...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't remember much of the time when Darkness consumed the Thirteenth. Just the cold and the emptiness...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000380_RYNE<tab>Zero? Are you all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Aye. I'm fine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000400_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're the one who stopped this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000410_RYNE<tab>Oh, no no. That was the first Oracle of Light, Minfilia. She's since left us, but I inherited her power and legacy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I see...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000430_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Let's get started then, shall we?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000440_RYNE<tab>The other transmitters are set. Whenever you're ready.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Such radiant Light...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000460_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's almost too much for one steeped in Darkness like me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000470_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000480_JULLUS<tab>Whatever may have happened in the past, you're still here, Zero. Alive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000490_JULLUS<tab>What you couldn't do yesterday, you might still do today.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If this power were mine to wield...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CRY OF PAIN “Argh! Ahhhhhh!] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ENDURING PAIN GRUNT “Urgh”] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will not succumb... Not to Darkness...nor to Light!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[PSYCHING ROAR “Yaaaaaargh!”] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000550_RYNE<tab>Zero!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000560_RYNE<tab>She's...taken Light into herself!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000570_RYNE<tab>Her body struggles to contain it. She needs help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[FAINT GROAN “Ugh”] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000590_RYNE<tab>Thank goodness... How do you feel?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Better now, I think.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000610_RYNE<tab>Then you're very, very lucky. Whatever possessed you to do that?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000620_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I had to know if I could command the Light. If I could change my fate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Once, I would never have dared to dream it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But your friendship and your trust has helped me to see new possibilities. In myself and everything else.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps that's why, when I beheld this world once damned yet saved, I saw the potential for mine to be saved as well.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000660_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To become a world where Light and Darkness are in harmony, and life flourishes. A world where we're not consumed by insatiable hunger, but filled with hope for what we might create together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000670_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If I had the strength, perhaps I could make such a dream reality. Perhaps I could awaken us from this endless nightmare.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000680_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That's what possessed me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000690_RYNE<tab>If that's your heartfelt desire, then you mustn't be afraid to share it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000700_RYNE<tab>There was a time when I lacked the courage. To voice my desires was to burden those I love...or so I convinced myself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000710_RYNE<tab>But then I met those who believed in me. They helped me to believe in myself and find the strength to live.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000720_RYNE<tab>And so long as I'm alive, I know that I'll be fine. No matter how dire things seem. No matter where I am.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000730_RYNE<tab>To be able to think that brought me peace, and it's a blessing I owe entirely to my friends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those who believe in us...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000750_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will remember your words. I know all too well that there's a limit to what we can achieve alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000760_RYNE<tab>As a friend, I'd like to help you fulfill your dream.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000770_RYNE<tab>If you wish to take in more Light, I can keep the power in check and help your body accept it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If anyone can do it, it'd be Ryne.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It worked well enough for me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>With the power of Light <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> Dark, you'll be unstoppable!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So it would seem.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ah, yes. You mentioned having to absorb Light. That you still live is proof of her ability.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I certainly hope so.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Right, then. I'm counting on you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Here I go.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[STRUGGLING TO ABSORB LIGHT EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000840_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I can feel it. The Light's warmth welling within me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000850_RYNE<tab>Then I believe it worked.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With this power, I will return to the void and fight─for the world that once was, and for those I hold dear!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>All is in readiness. Without further ado, then... Light from beyond the rift, shine forth and banish the Darkness!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>Excellent. The tower is replete with Light from Nabaath Areng.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>Commencing transmission!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>It works! It works! Light is flowing into the void!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000910_LYNA<tab>May this Light illuminate your way!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000920_RYNE<tab>You can do it, Zero. I believe in you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Look─an opening!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>It worked. Let us waste no time and sally forth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, I fear the breach may be too narrow for you, Vrtra.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000960_VRITRA<tab>For a blessing, I prepared my simulacrum for such an eventuality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000970_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>My true form shall stand guard here while we explore the chasm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000980_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>'Tis faint, but I sense the presence of a dragon. No doubt my sister's essence trapped within Zeromus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_000990_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Not where she was held captive before, but somewhere much deeper.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The descent will not be so easy this time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The chasm swarms with voidsent.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001020_YSHTOLA<tab>Summoned by Golbez, perhaps, or born of the residual Darkness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001030_ESTINIEN<tab>However they came to be, we shall cut a path through them. Is everyone ready?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001040_ESTINIEN<tab>Zero...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>That Light should shine in the void once more...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>No single one of us could have made it so. Only by joining hands were we able to kindle this Light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Do you see, Golbez? We needn't damn others to save ourselves.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You knew this once, surely. When you tried to befriend me. When you were one of the precious few left willing to trust in another.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But that man is gone, and in his place a mockery of his beliefs.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001095_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's the same as before... Though we walk different paths, we seek the same destination. And yet...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There is something I must know. A truth that lies waiting in the dark.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001120_DURANTE<tab>Golbez!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001130_DURANTE<tab>This can't be happening... Not to you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001140_DURANTE<tab>My friend... My hero... I will stop you even should it cost me my life!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001150_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING, DOWN ON ONE KNEE] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001160_DURANTE<tab>Why? Why you and not me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001170_DURANTE<tab>You were the best of us. A paragon of virtue. I could never hope to be your equal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001180_DURANTE<tab>I am only the knight I am because of you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001190_DURANTE<tab>Because you believed in me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001200_DURANTE<tab>[SWORD SWINGING EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001210_DURANTE<tab>[PANTING] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001220_DURANTE<tab>[PAINED LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001230_DURANTE<tab>You would not wish to become a monster, preying upon those who've fought to protect. But neither can I bring myself to kill you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001240_DURANTE<tab>So rest easy, my friend, and entrust your legacy to me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001250_DURANTE<tab>You will never die, this I swear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001260_DURANTE<tab>Through me your name shall live on, as the hero who saves the world!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001270_YSHTOLA<tab>We've been released from the memory, 'twould seem.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001280_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If Golbez was the one sealed in this memoria...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001290_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then the one we've been fighting is...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>No more than an impostor playing at hero.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001310_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Durante, I presume.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>A name long since lost to time. History shall remember only Golbez.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001330_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Come what may, I shall deliver the world its salvation, and I will not suffer you to interfere.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You seek to free all souls from the purgatory of undeath. And to that end, you would invade another world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>While I cannot condone your methods, I understand your motive full well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For I'm driven by the same. I too wish to save our world.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001370_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I too once thought I had to bear the burden by myself. That I had no choice but to walk my path alone. But I was wrong. We may yet strive together towards our shared goal, if you would reconsider your course.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001380_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CONDESCENDING CHUCKLE] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001390_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>If you possessed power which transcended that of Zeromus, then perhaps I would.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001400_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you do not. No, you are but another voidsent, like me. And what is a candle before the sun?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Perhaps we aren't all-powerful and cannot effect great change in an instant. Even so...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001420_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Great change is what we need! Aught less has no meaning!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001430_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Having glimpsed our past, you should understand as well as any.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001440_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>As Golbez, I dedicated myself to ending the Contramemoria. I fought the corrupted memoriates, and attempted to redeem those twisted by their power.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001450_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Yet try as I might, I was powerless to make any meaningful change. 'Twas then, when I was floundering in despair, that she appeared─the Ascian Igeyorhm.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001460_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Claiming to know how to excise the source of our woes, she showed me to the moon, where the servant of Light abided. 'Twas he and his ilk who had granted men unnatural powers, she said, and now prolonged the war.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001470_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Believing her every word, I struck him down...and caused Darkness to engulf the world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What!? Then it was you who...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001490_YSHTOLA<tab>As Emet-Selch once told us, the Thirteenth was the Ascians' first attempt at a Rejoining, before they fully understood the mechanisms at play.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>They failed because they sought only to awaken the sundered Zodiark without instigating a calamity in the Source. The Darkness they unleashed had nowhere else to go...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001510_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Having left a ruin of our world, the Ascian fled. I was a fool to trust them. To trust in others.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001520_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Since that day, I have sought the means to undo my mistake. The world may be beyond saving, but I would at least restore the great flow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001530_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>The dragon was an extraordinary windfall. A veritable font of aether that expedited my endeavors time and again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001540_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But it wasn't enough to achieve my objective. Far from it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001550_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>For an eternity, I had to bide my time. But the day finally came when I acquired the power I sought.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001560_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Aye, the remnants of the Ascians' god sealed within the moon suddenly dispersed into aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>With that aether, Zeromus could be conceived. And driven by the dragon's longing for home, it shall soon arise to destroy the barrier between worlds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001580_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Thus will the way open to the promised land, and the death we have been too long denied.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001590_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Thus will I, Golbez, bring salvation to all!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001600_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So that is all you have left...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001610_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Say what you will. You cannot stop Zeromus's awakening.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>We're going after him, aren't we?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001630_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. That's why we came, after all. And besides...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When someone believes in you, it makes you want to believe in them. In others and yourself. Jullus was right about that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001650_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I had hoped to bear witness to the moment our salvation is realized...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001660_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But nothing must be left to chance. I will stop you here no matter the cost!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001670_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SPELLCASTING EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>[JUMP EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001690_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001700_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[TAKINNG DAMAGE EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001710_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Wounded as I am, I knew that I would be hard-pressed to fight you on equal terms.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001720_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And so I lured you to this place, where the advantage is mine!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001730_ESTINIEN<tab>The archfiends live!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impossible. Scarmiglione and Barbariccia were sealed in memoria, while Cagnazzo and Rubicante died in the Source...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>You are not wrong. They are not the true archfiends, but shades born of their residual aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001760_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If they are shades, then their strength will pale in comparison. Even should they fight as one, we may yet prevail.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We'll tend to the archfiends. Go and put an end to Zeromus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001780_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You'll do no such thing!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Go! We'll join you as soon as we can!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING TOWARD GOLBEZ EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001810_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BLOCKING HIT EXERT]

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001820_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It is too late. Zeromus <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> awaken, and it shall devour any who come between it and its desire. Your companion is no exception.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>I wouldn't be so sure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Time and again, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has faced insurmountable odds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001850_ESTINIEN<tab>But no matter how hopeless things seemed, <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> never given up the fight.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>[KNOCKING BACK ENEMY EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001870_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So long as he has strength of will to forge on, then so too shall we!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001880_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So long as she has strength of will to forge on, then so too shall we!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>For we believe in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, and <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> believes in us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And together, our Light can pierce blackest Darkness!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001910_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001920_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001930_ZEROMUS<tab>What is this Darkness, cold and all-consuming? Where am I?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001940_ZEROMUS<tab>I must return to my world... To my home, where my kin await...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001950_ZEROMUS<tab>Yes, I must return. I return. And none shall stand in my way!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Release Azdaja!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't let you destroy the barrier between worlds!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001960_ZEROMUS<tab>Begone from my sight!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001970_ZEROMUS<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001980_ZEROMUS<tab>Graaaaaah! [Report if displayed.]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_001990_ZEROMUS<tab>I shall not perish... So long as they await my return, I shall endure...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002000_ESTINIEN<tab>[SWINGING LANCE EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002010_ESTINIEN<tab>Are you all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002020_VARSHAHNBIG<tab> [ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002040_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Like all voidsent, Zeromus cannot be killed. Sealing it in memoria is the only way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002070_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Ah, that it should come to this...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002080_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>I failed my dear friend. Fell for the Ascians' ploy and unleashed the Darkness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>And after an eternity of waiting, I find myself on my knees...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>How disappointed must you be in me. In the foolishness and futility of it all...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[STRUGGLING TO STAND EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>No... I will not let it be for naught. I will not allow you to pass. I will triumph in my crusade!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>There is no triumph to be found in this madness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Even if the veil were to be unraveled, it would not undo what Darkness has done to the world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nor would it bring Golbez back. From his slumber, you know there is no return.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're weak and imperfect. You know it in your heart. In spite of this, do you truly believe that you can save everyone? Are you sure you will not fail?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I'm no better. Weak and imperfect and plagued by doubt. Which is why I need friends to walk beside me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002180_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Light...? But how?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002190_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This is proof that I believe in others, and they in turn believe in me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A light that illuminates the way in darkest despair.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002210_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Be it in a ruined city locked in ice or a world drowning in Light, it was with faith in one another that life endured. I see it clearly now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002220_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You think we are capable of the same?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002230_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It won't be easy. Having lived too long as voidsent, we've forgotten how to trust.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002240_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But one thing is certain: if Zeromus succeeds and everyone dies, we'll never have the chance to try.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002250_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You asked me to join hands with you once, and I refused. I cannot take back that mistake, but I can extend to you the same offer. We can be better than we have been.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002260_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[SHOCKED GASP, REMEMBERING SOMETHING] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002270_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Of course. You were the memoriate we met all those years ago...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002280_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[BITTER LAUGHTER] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002290_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Yes, I remember now. We hoped you would join us in our quest to end the Contramemoria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002300_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you rejected us outright.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002310_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>It left both of us discouraged─Golbez most of all. “If we could but overcome the fear that has shaped and divided us, we could change everything.”
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002320_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Even in the midst of that terrible war, he never stopped believing in others. Not even at the end...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're Golbez now. If you would live up to his name, then you must trust in people as he did.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002340_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I cannot forgive what you have done to my sister. But she may yet be saved.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002350_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If you can help us see her safely home and protect the Source, then...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002360_YSHTOLA<tab>As Zero's friends, we should gladly share what knowledge we have to help you restore the void.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002370_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>You truly believe the world of old can be ours again?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I do. So long as we work together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002390_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We will disperse Zeromus's essence once more. The instant we do, you must call to Azdaja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Understood!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[LEAPING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002420_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[GASP, TAKEN BY SURPRISE] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Zero!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The suffocating Darkness... Like that of the rift...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002450_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Impenetrable... Disorienting... Untethered and drifting further away...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>Be strong, Zero! Don't give up!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002470_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Hold fast to yourself! Look to the Light within!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002480_YSHTOLA<tab>Your place isn't alone in the Dark, Zero. Not anymore!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You can do it, Zero!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you all right, Zero?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002490_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002500_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Of course.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002510_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002520_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You needn't worry about me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002530_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>With this power from beyond the rift, I can do it. I can save everyone!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Golbez! If you would make amends, then lend me your strength!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002570_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[CHARGING ATTACK EXERT] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Azdaja!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Hear my voice...and return to me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002610_AZDAJA<tab>(-Azdaja-)Oh, Vrtra... There thou art...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002620_AZDAJA<tab>(-Azdaja-)I am coming, Brother... I am coming...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>Have care! Zeromus makes to resurrect!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002640_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not if I have anything to say about it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002650_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No more, fiend!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002660_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You're safe now, Azdaja. You're safe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002670_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>To my sister, I shall offer up the eye in this vessel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>We dragons bring forth progeny with our very life force. That which my eye harbors should be enough to grant her corporeal form.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002690_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Of course, this means I shall no longer have control over this vessel. I must ask you escort Azdaja to the surface in my stead.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002695_ESTINIEN<tab>[CLOSED-MOUTH LAUGH “Hmph”] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002700_ESTINIEN<tab>We came to bring her home, and we'll do just that. You have my word.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002720_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>At long last, we shall be together again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Where are you going?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002740_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Our world may yet be restored. I thought it an impossible dream once, but having witnessed your miracles, I cannot help but believe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002750_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Nevertheless, I am the villain who wrought this tragedy. And in my misguided crusade, I compounded my sins.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002760_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>My place is not at your side.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>[WEARY SIGH] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002780_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Regardless of how you may feel, by lending me your strength, you've made amends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002790_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You've earned a new beginning.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002795_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It's up to you what we become to one another.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002800_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What we couldn't do yesterday, we might still do today. Working together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>And should we want for strength, we need only rally more like-minded souls to our cause.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002820_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So let's take the first step. The two of us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002830_VRITRA<tab>Words cannot well express my relief that we could rescue my sister, nor my gratitude to all of you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002840_VRITRA<tab>What of him? Golbez.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>He felt it would be inappropriate for him to be present at your reunion with Azdaja, and chose to remain down in the chasm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If you wish to hear an apology, however, I should be glad to drag him here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002870_VRITRA<tab>Nay, that shall not be necessary. By his deeds hath he demonstrated his contrition.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>So, what will you do now?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I've learned much journeying together with you. Experienced things I could never have experienced alone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Together with Golbez, I hope to do the same as we labor to restore the Thirteenth.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002910_ESTINIEN<tab>Then I suppose it's farewell for now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Be sure to share with Golbez what you've learned of the Source and its reflections, as well as the true nature of Light and Dark.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002930_YSHTOLA<tab>He is as resourceful as he is determined, and will surely make the very most of the insights.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002940_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Indeed. Once we've gained a better understanding of the situation, I hope we can rely on your counsel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002950_YSHTOLA<tab>But of course. I too shall continue probing new possibilities, the better to be of aid when the time comes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002960_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, speaking of which...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002970_YSHTOLA<tab>From ocean rise and cloudbank form, From mountain spring and rainfall storm, From river flow and life be born...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>Come forth, my servant!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>I revised the incantation. Which is not to say you know how it went before...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_002995_YSHTOLA<tab>Are we clear?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003000_YSHTOLA<tab>Nidhana provided me with spare warding scales, which apparently provide greater protection than before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003010_YSHTOLA<tab>This should keep the familiar safe. So long as you give the nixie aether from time to time, it will persist and serve as a beacon for us to find you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Already we find ourselves with a new ally. Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When you have the chance, please thank everyone for me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Those in Radz-at-Han, Garlemald, Sharlayan...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...the First, and on the moon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A lengthy list.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>A gift for Ryne, in return for the Light she helped me harness. It's the memoria holding Zeromus.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If used to augment Darkness in the First, it may help to create balance between our worlds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>An excellent idea.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003100_YSHTOLA<tab>Similarly, why not entrust the archfiends' memoria to Zero?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>In that case, I shall pass them on to Golbez. To inspire and admonish him in equal measure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see you again, right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Thirteenth is in good hands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You should know about Unukalhai and Cylva...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You will, I'm sure. Just don't try to forcibly summon me. I won't come.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003130_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Come what may, we will see it restored. And should we need a helping hand, I hope we can count on you once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What? There are others from our world who seek to restore it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003150_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then please tell them this: though we are worlds apart, in our shared objective, we walk as one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003160_VRITRA<tab>Sad though it is to say farewell, 'tis past time we returned home. Pray climb upon my back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Till we meet again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003180_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No matter where we are or how much time passes, our bond will endure. This I believe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003190_JULLUS<tab>Oh, it's you again. Is everything all right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003200_ALPHINAUD<tab>So you were able to rescue Azdaja... Thank the Twelve.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003210_ALISAIE<tab>Channeling Light from the First was rather ingenious. It may fall short of cross-rift travel, but it's still an impressive achievement in my book.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003220_YSHTOLA<tab>You're too kind. Suffice it to say, though, that I don't intend to rest on these laurels. There's always more to be done.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003230_JULLUS<tab>Zero stayed in the void, did she? Well...if I had known it would come to that, I would've said a proper farewell.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero took your words to heart.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Zero sends her thanks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003240_JULLUS<tab>Really...? I don't remember saying anything profound...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003250_JULLUS<tab>Thanks for what? I don't recall doing anything in particular for her. On the contrary, she's the one who risked life and limb.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003260_JULLUS<tab>Still...I'm glad that she got something out of her time here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003270_JULLUS<tab>As the days roll on, things will change for the both of us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003280_JULLUS<tab>But some things will remain as they are.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003290_JULLUS<tab>As far as I'm concerned, Zero will always be a friend and comrade. And I will never forget her.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003300_ALISAIE<tab>If she's working tirelessly to restore the Thirteenth, it wouldn't do to be outdone here. When next Zero visits, we must see to it that you have a shiny new Garlemald to show her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003310_JULLUS<tab>Indeed... And speaking of rebuilding, there's a matter I'd like to discuss with you and Alphinaud.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003320_JULLUS<tab>Word has spread of our dealings with Radz-at-Han, and people are excited by the prospect of standing on our own two feet again. Naturally, it won't be straightforward─it never is─but on the whole, I have a good feeling about things.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003330_ALPHINAUD<tab>In other words...it may be time for us to limit our involvement, that Garleans might take the lead? I can see the sense in that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003340_JULLUS<tab>No, no, that's not what I meant at all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003350_JULLUS<tab>Seeing as things are going well, we want you to take a rest. A <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> rest. That's what I wanted to say, on everyone's behalf.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003360_JULLUS<tab>You've done so much for us already. Toiled beside us in the cold for far longer than anyone could ask.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003370_JULLUS<tab>You've earned a reprieve a hundred times over. So go on, step away from here and head...wherever you like. But if it were me, I'd choose somewhere warm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003380_ALISAIE<tab>I was thinking of taking a break anyway...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Far be it from us to go against such a heartfelt request. Though I would be lying were I to say matters here wouldn't weigh on our minds...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003400_ALISAIE<tab>We could take a leaf out of Zero's book and roam about for a while.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003410_ALISAIE<tab>Maybe visit nations who share little history with Garlemald─look for opportunities to foster future relations. We might learn something of recent foreign affairs that has escaped our notice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hm, as an independent party, we would be well suited to the task... An excellent idea, Alisaie.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003430_JULLUS<tab>Well, that hardly sounds like a rest at all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003440_ALPHINAUD<tab>To us, it is the best kind of rest─stimulating and meaningful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003450_ALISAIE<tab>If it's settled, then let's return to Sharlayan and consider our options.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003460_ALISAIE<tab>What about the rest of you? Do you have any plans?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003470_YSHTOLA<tab>We're indebted to Lord Fourchenault and his colleagues for their cooperation. 'Twould be meet to report on the outcome of our mission.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003480_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then it seems we are all bound for Sharlayan. Upon arriving, let us seek out Atheleys at the Rostra and have her notify Father.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003490_BEQLUGG<tab>Ah yes, the king has already shared what they glimpsed in the Source. The day is won, and the danger passed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003500_BEQLUGG<tab>Hearing the tidings lifted a great weight from my shoulders. Never before had I taken on such a monumental request.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003510_LYNA<tab>Small though it was, we are glad to have played a role in saving the Exarch's home, and yours.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003520_LYNA<tab>Furthermore, the endeavor served to reaffirm the bond between the peoples of Norvrandt.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003530_LYNA<tab>Nurturing this bond, we will strive to be an example for the world Zero aspires to restore.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003540_RYNE<tab>Is that...a memoria crystal? I can feel it... The tremendous Darkness within...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003550_RYNE<tab>Using Darkness from the void to restore balance to this world... If such a thing could be done...!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003560_BEQLUGG<tab>Well, well... Though night has returned to our world, Darkness cannot arise of its own accord, much less in abundance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003570_BEQLUGG<tab>But if it could be brought here in like manner to how we channeled Light to the void, it may well be possible to restore the Empty in its entirety!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003580_BEQLUGG<tab>Do you still have that spirit vessel with you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003590_BEQLUGG<tab>If so, I beg you loan it to me for a time. I would use it to investigate a way to have the tower receive rather than send energy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003600_BEQLUGG<tab>Thank you. I shall commence my work at once in concert with Unukalhai, and rigorously explore the possibility.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003610_BEQLUGG<tab>Thank you. While I make no promises at this stage, I shall rigorously explore the possibility.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003620_RYNE<tab>I too need to explore new possibilities for my powers. My recent experience at Nabaath Areng has taught me that.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003630_RYNE<tab>To that end, I will set aside botany for a time, and focus instead on myself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003640_RYNE<tab>Knowing Zero is out there, doing her utmost to restore her own world... It inspires me to redouble my efforts!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003650_GAIA<tab>There you are.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003660_GAIA<tab>I waited and waited, but you never came. What have you been doing here?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003670_RYNE<tab>Gaia!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003680_GAIA<tab>Oh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003690_GAIA<tab>Do I know you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Don't tell me you've lost your memory again!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We promised to go for coffee biscuits, remember?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003700_GAIA<tab>Oh, I'm just teasing. I wouldn't forget you in a hurry.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003710_GAIA<tab>I'm still keeping my diary, adding new memories to it every day.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003720_RYNE<tab>Not only that, Gaia's writing a story too. I can't wait for it to become a book!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003725_GAIA<tab>
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003730_GAIA<tab>I never agreed to anything of the sort.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003740_GAIA<tab>Besides, coffee biscuits are old news. I'd rather try something else.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003750_RYNE<tab>What? I thought you liked them too... Well, no matter. The Second Serving has something for every taste, so let's just go!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003760_GAIA<tab>Enough about that. What were you talking about?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003770_GAIA<tab>Harnessing Darkness from the void... Now there's an idea.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003780_GAIA<tab>Of course, if you're dealing with Darkness, Ryne alone won't cut it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003790_GAIA<tab>Next time, call on me as well. All right?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003800_NAHBDEEN<tab>It cannot be...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003810_NAHBDEEN<tab>Oh, Varshahn, my darling little brother... To think that I will never see you again...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003820_NIDHANA<tab>The way you carry on, anyone would think he was actually your brother...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003830_NIDHANA<tab>Save your tears, now. His Excellency still has one of his eyes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003840_NIDHANA<tab>And he has made it clear he intends to continue using his vessel. You'll see Varshahn again, never fear!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003850_NAHBDEEN<tab>Truly? But...will it be the little one?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003860_NIDHANA<tab>Personally, I prefer the adult vessel. It cuts a gallant figure, and has superior functionality besides.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003870_NAHBDEEN<tab>Bah, I don't care about such things!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003880_NAHBDEEN<tab>My little brother is...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003885_NAHBDEEN<tab>Little! And adorable!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003890_NIDHANA<tab>Sisters give me strength...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis a fine thing being so loved.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003910_ESTINIEN<tab>Had enough of the revelry, have you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003920_ESTINIEN<tab>So, what's next for our hero?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003930_ESTINIEN<tab>No need to decide just yet. You'll recall our escapades in the void began with a treasure map I paid entirely too much gil for.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003940_ESTINIEN<tab>You can't force an adventure. It'll happen when it happens, and you'll know when the time is right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003950_ESTINIEN<tab>Till then, it's good to lend an ear to others and their tales. And speaking of others...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003960_YSHTOLA<tab>Discussing each other's plans, are we?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003970_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, I have nothing exciting to share. I foresee an extended confinement in my Sharlayan chambers, compiling my theories on cross-rift travel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>My research may be classified, prohibited by the powers that be...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_003990_YSHTOLA<tab>But so long as a bond exists between people, ever shall our worlds be connected. As it stands, a means to travel to the First is within reach, and I would be satisfied even should my research not exist in an official capacity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004000_YSHTOLA<tab>And what of you, Estinien? Have you any plans?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004010_YSHTOLA<tab>[CHUCKLE] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004020_YSHTOLA<tab>He never was one to stay put for long. Though I've no doubt he will make himself known when needed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004030_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Old Sharlayan...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004040_KRILE<tab>Everything appears to be in order...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004050_KRILE<tab>Ahhh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004055_KRILE<tab>Finished at last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004060_KRILE<tab>So time-consuming... How nice would it be to have a mammet to handle such tasks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004070_KRILE<tab>Now then, let's have a look at you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004080_KRILE<tab>Quite old, this letter. We'll need to store it carefully.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004085_KRILE<tab>[GASP] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004090_KRILE<tab>Addressed to Grandfather! And come all the way from Tuliyollal, from a Guloo...someone.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004100_KRILE<tab>The ink's too faded. Hardly anything is legible.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004110_KRILE<tab>Come on, give me something...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004120_KRILE<tab>A commission to investigate the golden city...in Tural!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004130_KRILE<tab>How odd... No one ever mentioned such a commission, nor have I seen any records.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004140_KRILE<tab>Hm? Something else in here...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004150_KRILE<tab>What an unusual earring. How does it relate to the petition, I wonder...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004160_KRILE<tab>Did you go there, Grandfather? To the golden city, in Tural?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004170_ERENVILLE<tab>[SIGH] Report if displayed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004180_ERENVILLE<tab>Back again already, after making a show of leaving...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004190_ERENVILLE<tab>Well, this is it. Sharlayan.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004200_ERENVILLE<tab>Quite a far cry from Tuliyollal, yes?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06500_004210_ERENVILLE<tab>Come, let's go and find your candidate─our adventurer friend.
